website_summaries.verdict: Stylish hollow body acoustic electric guitar from Glen Burton. Has a good, full-bodied sound.
pros: Flame top with basswood back and sides
Great starter guitar with everything one needs for acoustic steel or amplified guitar playing
Comes with amplifier, set of strings, pick, digital clip-on tuner, and gig bag
cons: Battery that ships with the guitar doesn't last long

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP!!!! GUITAR STRAP BROKE DURING 1st USE!!! DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this guitar as a Christmas present beginner instrument for my son to learn on. He plays tuba in his high school band and wants to expand his knowledge. After a very busy high school band season, he just put the strap on today to practice and the fabric strap failed. Guitar fell 3-4 feet on thick carpet and the fret/neck section shattered. The hole on the fabric strap split as the picture shows. I've been an Amazon PRIME customer from almost the very beginning, this is by far the worst service I've received and I'm starting to think I should look elsewhere. Unacceptable. Needs to be made right.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good guitar but accessories are crap
customer_reviews.text: The guitar is great. And a great price for an electric/acoustic guitar. The gig bag is cheap and doesn't really protect the guitar when accidentally bumping up against things. The speaker/amplifier never worked. I tried multiple cords and plug ins.
customer_reviews.author: C Gentry

customer_reviews.title: and it works great for him
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas so my son and I could take lessons together. He has a Fender Squire, and it works great for him. I wanted something acoustic and electric so I got this. For me as a beginner, this so far has been a great guitar to learn on. No problems so far and our teacher even said he really likes it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: jes3

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar for the money. Sounds great and plays very nice. Of course there's little things here and there that comes with a guitar at this price point. Little imperfections in the finish, sides of frets are sharp, bridge pins are cheap etc... Nothing major though. The amp is garbage. It sounds terrible. Gig bag is decent. The tuner is real nice especially considering these types of tuners run in the $20-$30 range.
customer_reviews.author: Haz

customer_reviews.title: Missing most items :-(
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, had to give this item only one star. Bought it for my daughter as a surprise birthday gift. When she opened it yesterday, to our surprise items were missing that we’re suppose to be included. The items missing were the extra guitar strings, guitar belt, guitar tuner, batteries and even the travel bag. So excited because I knew that this is what she wanted and now it’s an incomplete birthday gift. Really sad and disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Rock of my domain

customer_reviews.title: Best Beginner Guitar Out There!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bundle as a Christmas present for myself. I have been playing guitar for over 10 years and wanted to give this "beginner bundle" a try and I was very impressed. It really has everything a beginner would need! Beautiful guitar, extra strings, multiple guitar picks, a tuner, and even an amp for getting used to playing at live events. If it came with some sort of beginner lesson tutorial it would be perfect. I still play this guitar a ton and have made a few videos using it (and reviewing it) on my YouTube channel. 10/10 would recommend this guitar to anyone looking for a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT NOT SAME AS IN PICTURE DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: The guitar was not the same as what is shown in the picture, the color was, but the electric panel where you put battery into for amp is not the same. Guitar DOES NOT COME WITH battery, guitar picks or capo like it shows in picture. I replaced item after the first one came with a broken guitar string and the second guitar came messed up as well. DO NOT BUY! Now my daughter won't get a Christmas gift until after Christmas, and this is all she wanted so thanks GLEN BURTON (AKA CHINA)
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Unboxed everything fine until the guitar and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Unboxed everything fine until the guitar and the neck was cracked all around. The last string (6th?) was broken and the top was dinged up due to improper handling, it literally rubber through the box and got scratched. I didn’t even plug in the amp to see if it worked. I boxed everything right back up. Will return and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Guitar, tuner, and strings all suck ass.
customer_reviews.text: Had to downgrade this review. The guitar doesn't hold tuning for more that 5 minutes of playing, no documentation on changing the really crappy strings it ships with, and overall a pile of steamy crap. Plus, the tuner it ships with would have better value as protection against Covid19. Means if you have good aim, you can sling it at someone's face, because it sucks as a tuning guide. As soon as I can get this crap packaged, I'm shipping this pile of camel dung back to Amazon. It. Really. Sucks!! N
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: This guitar is for a beginner and comes with everything a beginner needs to get playing. Not very good quality workmanship and probably won't last if the beginner is committed to really learning the guitar. If the beginner discovers they want to try something else instead of the guitar, it isn't a great deal of money to lose. The Amp didn't work and Amazon sent a replacement the next day. Knowing what I was going to get and what to expect I don't think I could be any happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve A.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold tune
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner and didn't want to pay the big bucks for a guitar that I may never be able to play. Liked that this came fully loaded for a beginners price. Opened it, excited to play. Electronics didn't work and the strings wouldn't hold a tune. By the time I got to the 1st string the 6th string had gone out of tune - over and over again. Sent it back within days.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!! Not bad at all!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at this set. EVERYTHING worked perfectly for me. The guitar was set up just fine. Good action. Good neck relief. Even the nut was cut correctly. The little amp worked nicely and was very quiet. Surprisingly it had a really nice sound. This seems like a great place for a new guitarist to start. By the way I have been playing for over forty years. Get one and try it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie griggs

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- BREWARE!! JUNK , doesn’t work with AMP
customer_reviews.text: Absolute nightmare!! Bought battery for guiltar (doesn’t come with ) and after buying a 5 volt for guiltar DOES NOT WORK!!! Quality Control issue , makes a sound like it quickly connects to amp but will not stay connected . Also comes with a guiltar tuner but requires a watch battery which costs more than the tunner! Was a gift for Christmas and I extremely sad and disgusted with the quality, and it not even working!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sicko

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Wood Breaks
customer_reviews.text: I was initially really impressed. The guitar is easy to play and it sounds so good. Everything works well including the amplifier. After a few days I noticed a crack started to form where the neck meets the body. I've been very gentle with the guitar too. The materials must not be very good. Maybe I just got a bad one but I'm returning it and buying a higher quality guitar.
customer_reviews.author: JJman00

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money even at this price !
customer_reviews.text: i am almost sure the good reviews on this guitar came from paid customers because even at $139 this is the worst guitar I have ever bought . I do not have the time to return this guitar or I would right now . Amazon you should be ashamed to sell such an awful item . This thing looks used worse than used scratches all over it and just poor quality from top to bottom. I don't even want my money back for I should have known better but live and learn as they say . People do not waste one dime of your money on this guitar . Thank You and God Bless .
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Good item. Fast delivery. Son is happy
customer_reviews.text: The guitar is great. The sound quality very good. The strap is well made and good. We did not expect the amp to be of the greatest sound, and it is not, but it serves it's purpose for a solo player. The bag is not very good. It is okay, but not really going to do anything except protect from maybe scratches. The black finish is not even in all places and there is some fade in the higher use/touch areas, but my son thinks it gives it character. He is very please with this item overall.
customer_reviews.author: Moku

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, didn't function as it should
customer_reviews.text: battery compartment which makes it functional with an amp did not make connection with battery making it useless with an amp. I ended up returning it without difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: R. Glaesman

customer_reviews.title: not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Took a week longer in delivery, recieved it by having to drive 15 miles to a USPS to pick it up and wait 2 hours in line! Get it home for my daughter which is now past her birthday and we start tuning it and string e1 breaks not even close to tune, replace it and breaks imidiately, strings e2,e3 do the same thing! Amp is so low powered and output not what expected. Honestly not worth it. Now I have to buy more string and a better amp and wasted a lot of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Ekstrand

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar
customer_reviews.text: I really love the guitar. I decided to pick the guitar back up after stopping for few years. It took about three days to come after initial purchase; I ordered it on a Friday night and received it on Monday morning. The guitar is really beautiful. The kit includes three picks, guitar (of course!), amplifier, guitar strap, and guitar bag. The amp is really not that great due to the fact that it is really low. The guitar audio sounds the same with and without the amp. The only plus is that you can manipulate the guitar equalization with the amp. The customer service was really great, when I had issues it was solved right away!
customer_reviews.author: s jones

customer_reviews.title: Two back to back defective pickups
customer_reviews.text: The amp worked, the cable from amp to guitar worked (tested with another guitar). When putting the battery in the guitar for the pick up, for both orders, noticed that the battery light would flicker before it was even seated and clicked in. Once clicked in, no little red light and no sound from the amp. A bit frustrating and would recommend spending a little extra on a different set up for a more quality item. The box was stamped very proudly and in large font "MADE IN CHINA" and it certainly showed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Guitar is fine. However, when we got it, it was a gift btw, the amp doesn't work. Either that or the connection to guitar. Had to buy battery for the guitar. Did that and does not work. Not happy as this was a birthday gift. Exchanging. Sure hope the new one works otherwise I'll post a terrible review to let you guys know. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality and also different then discription
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plywood guitar and the pre amp is not the same as in discription.. I had an unfortunate issue where the pre amp not only weren't the ones that should come on the guitar but they didn't work on not one but 2 different orders ..
customer_reviews.author: louie C

customer_reviews.title: AVOID - Received 2 Defective Units!
customer_reviews.text: Outward appearance of guitar is very appealing out of the box. However, electric pickup on guitar did not work. Replaced battery twice - no success. Returned this guitar and took a chance on a second. Electric pickup on 2nd guitar worked for about 30 minutes...then same result. Very disappointing. Guitar comes with no owner's materials nor any customer service number. Returning and looking for another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Russell B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Sweet Deal
customer_reviews.text: I got this guitar about a week ago. Decided to learn something new during this whole self isolation thing. Pros: Guitar looks great, sounds pretty good Cons: Doesn't come with the 9V battery needed to plug into amp, guitar tuner didn't come with battery, strap is kind of garbage. Worth the money though for sure. Seems like a pretty great starter guitar
customer_reviews.author: Tim Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good starter set. I got this for my partner as a holiday gift and she loves it. The only problem I've had with the guitar is that I had to adjust the action since the guitar would buzz a little bit (acoustic) and a lot on the electric. I highly recommend for folks thinking of getting this as a gift for beginners or, for anyone who enjoys playing casually.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice guitar for a low cost.
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old son loves this guitar, and he's played on some pretty decent ones. We actually changed the strings to higher quality ones, but other than that it's a nice guitar for the price. The amp was DOA, however it was easy to open and it turned out the power wires going to the switch had come off. The amp was obviously cheaply made, but it sounds fine now that we got it working, just don't plan on the amp being anything special, and it make need some repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Eomer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: ..... Amplifier worthless. It does not work. No quality control
customer_reviews.author: T. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Unbeatable value.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I hesitated at first due to returns not being free but I’m so glad I went for it. I’ve been playing for over 20 years. I don’t plan on doing any live performances or crazy elaborate gigs so I don’t know how it would hold up in those cases but for at home, everyday play, this is a killer deal. Quality is great. Strings and neck feel great. Sound is great. Comes with everything you need to get going except batteries for the tuner. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MissP

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Been waiting for this to come up on my many Amazon buys. Got ot on impulse. Whoops a daisy. All included. Complete system. Broken amp included! Do amplifiers go Clunk? Speaker broken loose from mounting. Fixed it but imagine kid on Christmas morning. Gift is not gonna happen.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Weber

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty sweet rig!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and am really impressed with it. I'm returning it due to the fact it's a full sized guitar and not a slim body but everything worked great and it's a beauty. I'd keep it but I have other wants for the budget. I wouldn't hesitate to buy this guitar if I wanted a decent full sized version. It tuned perfectly and stayed in tune fantastically.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality due to intonation problems across the neck
customer_reviews.text: Guitar looks good from outside and doesn't feel cheap. Even after acclimating for a few days and adjusting the truss rod, there are major issues with intonation (how notes play in tune across the neck). After tuning the guitar open strings sound good but starting with the first fret, played notes are almost half a tone off-tune at times. It makes the guitar sound very bad because of this (strumming or fingerpicking alike). The mic setup inside the guitar appears loose as well making tumbling noises when the guitar is moved. I will return this tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Does not work won’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: The speaker was poop The guitar screen were trash you need to buy sepetate ones The guitar itself of made out of wool but the top part can breach easily
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: happy customer very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: delivery was fast and product is good quality feels durable exactly as described i would definitely recommend this seller and i would purchase again? money well invested!
customer_reviews.author: Nate and Christina

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying WOW!!! This is an amazing guitar package. Everything you need in one swift purchase. This guitar is of great quality and craftsmanship. It is even more beautiful in person and after tuning it sounds amazing. From beginners to pros this guitar and amp has something for everybody. Don’t hesitate when buying this, you will absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daraj Elknud

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was not worth the money we returned it because it was damaged
customer_reviews.author: Jr Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great Gutair, Stupid People
customer_reviews.text: The gutair is amazing, but when i got it, it was way out of tune (which is fine) and then I realized there’s an extra Low E string and no G string and the rest of the strings are not in the correct position.
customer_reviews.author: J. Machovina

customer_reviews.title: Absolute GARBAGE! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this, but my excitement soon turned to dread because none of the electronics work but you only get to find that out fully after buying a battery for it because it doesn't come with one. Amazon should be ashamed for selling this crap. There's tons of reviews stating the same issues. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: shane holder

customer_reviews.title: and gig bag are useless to me
customer_reviews.text: I give it five stars for the price of admission. The included tuner, and gig bag are useless to me. Took me a bit of time to tune. Sounds beautiful now. Just download a guitar tuner app for your phone...trust me. My amp works fine. It isn't a power House, but seems well made. Got the black, and it is so nice looking. Go for it. Bang for the buck folks!!
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the guitar for my 14 year old daughter. Great for beginners, came with a tuner (which was very easy to tune for someone that does not play a guitar)! She was very excited to get started! Shipping was fast & had everything with it ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. The amp connection was missing pieces, and the bridge was already pulling up. It’s a nice looking guitar and the tuner works great, but poor manufacturing quality and quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Toga Girl

customer_reviews.title: A new should work just fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used one and the electronics do not work so I’m just gonna replace them with upgraded stuff looks great sounds great just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Defective Goods
customer_reviews.text: The electronic components in the acoustic guitar were defective as well as the small amplifier. Returned to Amazon for full refund. Very disappointing products from China!
customer_reviews.author: Gant Klausner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago, and I just came across where Amazon wanted me to review it. I LOVE the guitar, one of my friend's dad makes guitars and she plays professionally. She was impressed at the quality and sound from a guitar this inexpensive. So far, no issues with tuning, no issues with cracking or any other problems. I would buy again if I needed another. I also love the worn look of the fret board, and the grey/black color.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Just Average
customer_reviews.text: This guitar needed work. The action was way too high. Otherwise sounds good acoustically. Also had problem getting 9v battery holder access open. Finally had to get Bridgecraft USA to send amp replacement after getting no where with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Guitar has had problems
customer_reviews.text: The guitar is very good on the acoustic part but the electric part is not working my family and I have tried several different methods and are almost positive that the pickup is not functioning. So now I’m going to have to go to a professional music store to find out how to access and fix the problem. My main thing is I know that things happen, but for me to have to pay extra money is not fair to a buyer that has already spent money on a product.
customer_reviews.author: Vy

customer_reviews.title: Great for acoustic playing
customer_reviews.text: Guitar is great for the price. Amp is small, like baby's first amp. I think it's too much guitar for the amp to handle as their is feedback when playing electric but we don't use the amp much. Guitar is wonderful for the price and plays well. We got a Fender clip on tuner instead of one it came with. Would recommend for acoustic, not so much if relying on playing electric with provided amp.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Smith

customer_reviews.title: this item is as described
customer_reviews.text: I'm just learning to play with my son and needed a better guitar to practice on. This is good for beginners and I have not had any major issues with it. It did go out of tune frequently at first, but it seems to stay in tune now. Sounds like a friends more expensive guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Steele

customer_reviews.title: good pickin'
customer_reviews.text: sound great and stays in tune, the only issue is the gig bag that comes with it is junk and the zipper was split. but i just bought a hard case for it.
customer_reviews.author: steven t.

customer_reviews.title: Items broken upon arrival or not working all together .
customer_reviews.text: Guitar arrived broke had to pay 30.00 to get it repaired. Chromatic tuner that came with it also doesn't turn on despite trying to change the batteries, had to purchase another elsewhere Wich again came out of my pocket expected for the 150.00 it would have arrived in better shape.
customer_reviews.author: kara desantis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 8 year old who wanted to learn to play. I went with this instead of a child's guitar and I'm glad I did. She still needs to grow into it, but excellent quality and came with a TON of extras so it was well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pack, doesn’t include capo
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter guitar. I am a novice and have been practicing daily. The only thing this does not include that you’ll need to play songs is a capo. They’re like $4-7, so I was surprised that this kit didn’t include one.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the cost. The guitar can be used as an acoustic or plug it into the amp and you have an electric acoustic sound. Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Swigert

customer_reviews.title: Very secure packaging + everything a beginner needs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband, he recently decided to learn guitar. This set is perfect for beginners! You get everything you need! Packaging was great and very secure as to not be damaged during transportation. This guitar is a great size for a preteen or and adult.
customer_reviews.author: Vibe_LikeAMother

customer_reviews.title: great starter guitar for the money
customer_reviews.text: This guitar surprised me! Beautiful color, playable with no fret buzz. Throw the strings away and get decent strings. It holds tune well on the tuners. The amp ain't much but it worked. Great for beginners. Not sure if it has a truss rod in the neck tho.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Smith

customer_reviews.title: AMP
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for his birthday. The only reason I am giving this a 3 star is because he loved the guitar but the amp does not work. Luckily he knows a little bit about wiring and found out how to fix it himself. Although the guitar is nice, if the amp didn't work no one should be paying extra for that. Just a thought.
customer_reviews.author: Larahfae

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long
customer_reviews.text: After playing it for about 6 months, the bridge cracked, and the tuners started to strip and come loose. Also the strings that came with it were garbage. I definitely expected more for the amount of money I spent on this instrument!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gilmartin

customer_reviews.title: Worth buyin; just dn't rd the seller's words of it too seriously. They don't know about guitars. 🤣
customer_reviews.text: A HEX KEY is NOT A TRUSS ROD. TRUSS RODS are built inside the guitar. The sellers do not know anything about guitars lol. 3rd party sellers know nothing! Lmao. Minus 1 star for not at least researching what you're selling. Have some respect for the truth. Have some respect for guitars. At least everything is working fine so far. It's a pretty nice deal for the offer.
customer_reviews.author: Cori S.

customer_reviews.title: NO BATTERIES!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: NO BATTERIES!!! CAN'T USE THE AMP WITHOUT BATTERIES!!! CAN'T FIND THE BATTERIES IN A STORE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Its Looks Cheap and Unfinished
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how unfinished the guitar looked, the bridge has plastic pieces sort of hanging off that look like they needed to be shave down, to me it looks better online and I guess you get what you pay for. I will be returning and spending a little more money for something more "put together" you can tell this is mass manufactured in China.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They don't send what they promised with set
customer_reviews.text: My order was delivered with big scratches, 3 of them, on the pick guard. I never got the tuner that came with it or the strings or extra picks! The sound of the guitar is great and the amp is pretty good. But to get it damaged and without everything that was promised with it, the tuner, picks and string... disappointed is what I am.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dunnam

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar for beginners
customer_reviews.text: We bought this one for my son who is 13, he liked it very much, he also Loved the color and craftsmanship, very good guitar for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Eyelin Serena Huerta Guizar

customer_reviews.title: Bogus
customer_reviews.text: The guitar will not work with the amp!! Light flashes on but will not play!!
customer_reviews.author: coby wayne forth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality items
customer_reviews.text: Foe the moeny this is a great package deal for beginners. Alot of good quality items. Guitar plays and sounds awesome for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SHAUN INSCOE

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend, and there was an issue with the battery compartment on the guitar. Customer service sent me a replacement very quickly and the replacement works perfectly. He loves it. It's nothing fancy but great for playing at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: The guitar is really not that good
customer_reviews.text: I disliked how the box can messed up while the guitar it’s self is just bad
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Its a guitar
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice until you really look at it. Fretboard is cracked...so is finish on the body. Also the tuner has a problem. The battery cover comes off no matter how tight you make it. It has a nice sound...you get what you pay for I guess. Prolly gonna let my 9 year old daughter play it
customer_reviews.author: Joshua chandler

customer_reviews.title: Scam alert. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Amp doesn't even power on. None of the electric components work. Even Spelling errors all over the place on labels. What a joke. Do not waste your money or time on this gutair.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Poor amp
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter's birthday in May. My order came in April so I had to wait a little over a month to give it to her. She has played it 2 or 3 times and now the amp doesn't work. A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hale

customer_reviews.title: First time learner review
customer_reviews.text: Just received my order today and looks great sofar. I have not yet played or started learning yet so I will update at another time. But, I wanted to share some pictures of what to expect realistically when it shows up. Nothing appears damaged and has come how I expected. Pictures provided to show packaging and that nothing looks damaged :). Happy sofar (once I learn to add pictures I will)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good guitar for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving this 4 stars since the amp that comes with it does not work! But other than that it’s a great sounding acoustic guitar! The price is worth the money for just the guitar alone!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Zaczkowski

customer_reviews.title: battery Packet
customer_reviews.text: Really great and my son loves it. He was especially excited about the amp but the battery pack is not lined up correctly so the amp doesn't work properly. It's a 9v battery and, for some reason, they chose to manufacture a spring connect instead of the usual clip on connect. I plan on rewiring it with a clip on attachment because I don't want to return and have him without his guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Wade

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: The guitar itself is a little difficult to use; Im still struggling to get the sound right when fingering. Package came with a dirty bag, missing guitar pics, missing aux cord, no batteries, no clip, or Alan key. I didn’t realize the necessity of all this until I really started learning how to play. PLEASE CHECK YOUR PACKAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great peice even better quality
customer_reviews.text: This guitar not only looks good but sounds great! The guitar itself is great quilty. The amplifier and straps as well as picks and extra guitar strings are an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: T. S. T.

customer_reviews.title: A nice guitar (great for beginners)
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of on the fence about getting this (mostly because I'm not a good guitarist) but it sounds great and I love having the amp, the only real problem I have with it is that it came with saw dust in the guitar
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY EARNED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been missing. It all looks just like what you see in the photo. The amp sounds great. And with a chorus or reverb pedal ... mic it out and be stage ready. As far as the guitar goes, great action on the fret board. Equalizer adds wonderful tone as well. And not noticing it came with a tuner was a real surprise. Well worth the money spent here with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ruzzo Knickerbocker

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This package was amazing and exactly what we were looking for, for our 13 year old. My only problem is that he just opened it this morning for Christmas and the case looks like it's stained with something.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Amp already busted. Guitar came with little wood chips chunked out. Not the worst guitar but it's annoying when something stops working right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beautiful guitar, love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and quality not so bad, the only thing is battery only last two day, I replaced it and still running death on third day with brand new 9 volts battery, the amplifier not bad, no impressed with it is only 10watts. Don’t get me wrong I happy with this guitar and played one in a while the acoustic sound is better than when is connected to the amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this guitar twice First time the battery outlet didn’t work Second time the battery outlet again doesn’t work. I wanted this whole thing so I could play the guitar and plug it in. I’m annoyed and would suggest a guitar player to not buy this. Ups please pick this up from my house
customer_reviews.author: Khady Graydon

customer_reviews.title: Solid chose for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this package for my son. He wanted to get his first guitar and I thought this kit was a solid buy. And it was. He’s very happy.
customer_reviews.author: kiley cole

customer_reviews.title: great guitar for price but why didn't my tuner come with a battery?
customer_reviews.text: Got my guitar today everything came in good shape but no battery in the tuner? What type of battery does it take? I don't know how to tune by ear so this is very frustrating being i cant play the guitar with out being able to tune it. If anyone knows the battery type for the tuner please let me know. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt boynton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if I could trust buying a guitar online, but it works perfectly! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. I could not more happy to learn guitar! I would totally advise everyone to get this product. I was super skeptical on buying musical items online but it came in 2 DAYS and looked, smelled, and wrapped for security! Awesome company and product!
customer_reviews.author: Michatman1358

customer_reviews.title: Faulty wiring is something to worry about with this guitar.
customer_reviews.text: We got the guitar and everything was fine, the guitar seems to have loose wires and refuses to work, but the amp works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Mostly for beginners
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this guitar and honestly, I already know how to play. But the sound quality is kinda bad, maybe with a change of strings I would sound better. I ended selling the guitar to one of my friends for $50 dollars, because I didnt like the way it sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar for a really good price. The tuner It came with is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbie Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Electric part of guitar does not work with amplifier after installing 9V battery
customer_reviews.text: The electric part of the Guitar never worked after installing the 9V battery. I even ordered a replacement and had the exact same issue
customer_reviews.author: Latosha Echelberry

customer_reviews.title: ... its clip 2 make amp work but was very pleased
customer_reviews.text: had to reconnect a wire that was off its clip 2 make amp work but was very pleased overall
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: The bridge is coming separated from the guitar not made ...
customer_reviews.text: The bridge is coming separated from the guitar not made very well at all
customer_reviews.author: kelly mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Amp isn't much to write home about. But it was included! Great value. Guitar sounds great. Stays in tune. Get it re-stringed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful guitar for beginners I love it the only think it say it brings the battery when it didn’t so your gonna need a 12v battery and one of those flat battery's for the tuner but over all this is a great deal I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Karimar

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great sound no rattles, took a couple days for the strings to stretch out and stay tuned but now it's all good. Throw a 9 volt in there and plug it and the amp actually sounds pretty good too! Thanks for a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Colin Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking set up but it doesn't work as an electric guitar. Should've just bought the accustic by itself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money nice like amp but my volume and equalizer came broken
customer_reviews.text: The guitar is wonderful works heady other than my equalizer and volume didn't work but I DIY kind of person so I'm good nut I would feel bad for some kids n
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar to just have around for people to play.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: The tuner wasn't the best but for my first guitar
customer_reviews.text: The tuner wasn't the best but for my first guitar, I am so excited and in love. Everything was included.
customer_reviews.author: venande simeus

customer_reviews.title: Eletronics not good
customer_reviews.text: After two months of sporadic use something happened between connection in the guitar and amplifier. Guitar is now fixing and cost will be more expensive than the own thing.
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: Decent guitar
customer_reviews.text: Decent guitar for the price. Very disappointed that it was broken upon arrival. Will update review if they contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: No customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit as a first guitar. I am a 58 year old beginner. Guitar seems to be decent quality. However the preamp on the guitar does not work. Have emailed customer service twice about it but have gotten no response. So I would say customer service is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Really nice guitar. For the price, you cant beat it. Amp is also better than I expected. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CharlieRVA

product_meta.title: Glen Burton GA204BCO-BK Acoustic Electric Cutaway Guitar, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Configuration:Guitar kitBridge craft USA musical instruments presents the exceptionally designed Glen Burton GA204BCO Acoustic Electric Cutaway Guitar in Black by Glen Burton. Perfect for the beginner or the expert, the full package comes with Strings, Picks, Gig Bag, Strap, Digital Clip-On Tuner, Truss Rod and a 10 Watt Amplifier . This excellent Acoustic Guitar also includes: Flame top; Basswood back and sides Catalpa Neck and Bridge; Rosewood Fingerboard Steel String; Sealed Gear Tuners EQ: Active 4 Band 7545 .
feature_bullets: Flame top; Basswood back and sides
Catalpa Neck and Bridge; Rosewood Fingerboard
Steel String; Sealed Gear Tuners. Number of Strings: 6
Includes: Strings, Picks, Gig Bag, Strap, Digital Clip-On Tuner, Truss Rod And 10 Watt Amplifier

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
